prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Musham, Harry A., The Graphic Solution of Triangles by Means of the Triangle Diagram/Graphic Calculation, Crerar Ms 157, Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library
